name: Waterverf
description:
Waterverf is a small, interactive waterscape where you can meet five cute creatures! Each of them wants to play with you, and if they're happy they'll give you a star(fish)! Can you collect all five?

Made in 48 hours as a gift to welcome my nephew to the world.

The game is meant for mobile in portait mode, but might have some touch input issues on older devices. It should run in any browser though!
